attributes.action: Allow animals to travel via air
attributes.additional_details: There is many people like me and my family who have to pay , or not travel due to the fact that someone needs to look after your pet. Who is considered part of the family. Some animal handlers can be nice some are totaly opposite. Aswell if u are foreigner u cannot take your animal home and show to rest pf the family. I know UK is no longer part of the Eu , but it would be nice if same rules to animal travel would apply.
attributes.background: To discuss possibility of dogs and other animals to travel to/and from Uk via air

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618006
